author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
It's time for another Let's Play! Jay and I break out the new Starter Set for HEROQUEST, with a double sided game board and 10 new Missions to play as a prequel to the original big boxed game. 

Coming in at just $70 CAD, this is a complete Heroquest game with the same board and components, some in cardstock and some still in plastic. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to Hasbro for the complimentary copy of the box to play and review. 

You can pick up your own copy of HeroQuest: FIRST LIGHT here: https://www.hasbropulse.com/uk/product/heroquest-first-light-english-version/G0978UU00

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementint
title: Let's Play! - Heroquest: FIRST LIGHT by Avalon Hill and Hasbro
